text: A fine service was performed for me today — the second PC-related service I’ve had from S-Mall — and I was again impressed and satisfied with the efficiency, thoroughness, friendliness, and fair charges. S-Mall is definitely my go-to outfit for anything PC-related.
A large name brand provider tried to quote me $2300 up-selling me on a solution i did not need.  Nick arrived on the same day and did exactly what I wanted for much less.  Highly recommend
We have contacted Nick during last 2 years when our company computers got problem. He always very responsive. Every time he came down and he can really slove the problem. Good service for sure!

My desktop computer stopped booting up and due to various complications, I had a tough time solving the issue. Before even coming to have a look at my desktop computer, S-team gave me a bunch of tips to try to see if any of them would help identify or resolve my issue. Although none of these helped solve the computer issues,  I was very grateful for the help.

Nick who came to help me was very knowledgeable and entertained my many questions on computer repairs and on what he was doing to help solve the problem of my computer not working. It was a fairly complicated procedure that ended up taking 2 hours and I definitely appreciated his approach to try the simplest paths to try and retain the information before we finally had to resort to a fairly drastic option. He stayed to help reinstall drivers and update the computer and ensure everything was running and all the information was still accessible and even helped resolve a few other unrelated issues.

I definitely recommend S-Mall and Nick for all computer related problems!

Recently they helped me fix my computer it was a hardware issue and they fixed it in 35 minutes the 4 stars as the prices were affordable for a software fix but they do it on site so if problem a is not it problem b and c will be shown to the customer, overall good service.
